dcterms:description: The OSDb dataset is an online-available corpus of movie subtitles, specifically using the 2011 version which contains approximately 30 million message-response pairs for training.
dcterms:title: OpenSubtitles database (OSDb)

dcterms:description: The Twitter dataset is a commonly used source of data in dialogue generation research, containing approximately 904K training examples formatted as context-message-response triples.
dcterms:title: Twitter
